page.title: 08FARMS ON THE S.DOWNS
page.content:
There are three areas of cultivated farmland in this block: a. Hillbarn Farm, Cocking (sq. 1) b. Land surrounding Broadham House, formerly Broadham Farm (sq. 9) c. Newhouse Farm, formerly known as Stein Farm, nr. E.Dean (sq. 11)
Hillbarn Farm, Cocking belongs to the Cowdray Estate but is no longer a separate farm. It is under the management of Tenant farmer Mr. A. Marks of Manor Farm, Cocking. Part of the land of Hillbarn Farm extends along the top of the Downs (sqs. 1&2). Broadham House, formerly Broadham Farm, is surrounded by cultivated fields, but we have not extablished to which farm they now belong. (sq.9). cont. page 9
